eventDecorators.name: DelegatedRepayment
eventDecorators.description: Emitted after the implementation contract has been swapped.

functionDecorators.name: repayDelegation
functionDecorators.description: Transfer token from msg.sender to itself, repays the debt of _delegator, and deposit the remaining to _delegator if the repaid amount is less than _amount.

parameterDecorators.name: _delegator
parameterDecorators.description: The wallet address to repay debt of.

parameterDecorators.name: _rateMode
parameterDecorators.description: The rateMode to use for repayment: 1 for Stable, 2 for Variable.
